mapper.insert: INSERT INTO k_class_notice ( class_notice_id, class_id, class_notice_no, class_notice_title, class_notice_con, class_notice_date, class_notice_file, class_notice_original, class_notice_type ) VALUES ( NEXTVAL(notice_id_seq), #{classId}, NEXTVAL(notice_no_seq), #{classNoticeTitle}, #{classNoticeCon}, date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d'), #{classNoticeFile}, #{classNoticeOriginal}, #{classNoticeType} )
mapper.select:
SELECT cn.class_notice_no, cn.class_notice_type, cn.class_notice_title, cn.class_notice_date,
c.class_id, c.prof_id,
u.user_id, u.user_name,
m.major_id, m.major_name FROM k_class_notice as cn JOIN k_class as c ON cn.class_id = c.class_id JOIN k_users as u ON c.prof_id = u.user_id JOIN k_major as m ON m.major_name = u.user_dept WHERE
c.class_id = #{classId} AND cn.class_notice_type = #{classNoticeType} AND
u.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT c.class_id, co.course_title, cm.class_member_id FROM k_class_member as cm join k_class as c on c.class_id = cm.class_id join k_course as co on co.course_id = c.course_id WHERE cm.stu_id = #{userId}
SELECT c.class_id, co.course_title FROM k_class as c join k_course as co on co.course_id = c.course_id where c.prof_id = #{userId}
